body.content:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Salam-Aleikum. It is my pleasure connecting with you.

I am Mr.  Wang Fulin, Chief Financial Officer with Jais Global Investment
LLC.

We offer Financial services (Debt Financing and Equity Financing within
$1Million to $2Billion) to prospective Project Owners with viable projects
that require financing. We will be pleased to consider a possible business
synergy with your Firm if you have projects in your portfolio that require
funding.

I look forward to hearing from you and we hope for a successful business
synergy with your firm.

N.B: Feel free to contact directly with your business summary, as it will
enable me have it presented to our investment committee for an initial
assessment for a possible formal funding consideration.

Have a great day and please stay safe amidst the current wave of Covid 19
Pandemic.

..................

Regards

Mr. Wang Fulin

Chief Financial Officer

JAIS Global Investment LLC

whastApp (+13477966269 )

U.S NEW YORK
